name: Zydeco Wikitext Parser
short_description: Zydeco is a wikitext parser written in PHP, and based on the Creole markup language 1.0 (see http://www.wikicreole.org/wiki/Creole1.0 for more details).  It includes some additional features such as support for MediaWiki-style tables.
